Beers
Beer related endpoints

Beers / index

GET /api/beers
List all beers

This endpoint returns the list of beers

Examples

GET /api/beers.json
200
{
  "beer_colors": [],
  "beers": [
    {
      "id": 1008,
      "name": "Bart Carter",
      "beer_color_id": null
    },
    {
      "id": 1009,
      "name": "Monserrat Wolff IV",
      "beer_color_id": null
    },
    {
      "id": 1010,
      "name": "Miss Robin Schinner",
      "beer_color_id": null
    }
  ]
}

Errors

500 Server crashed for some reason

Params

  • page : optional [ Must be a number. ]

    The page index

Beers / create

POST /api/beers
Create a beer

Examples

POST /api/beers
{
  "beer": {
    "name": "Guinness"
  }
}
200
{
  "beer_colors": [],
  "beer": {
    "id": 1034,
    "name": "Guinness",
    "beer_color_id": null
  }
}

Errors

500 Server crashed for some reason

Params

  • beer : optional [ Must be a Hash ]
    • name : optional [ Must be String ]

Checks

Checks / create

POST /api/checks
Create a check

Examples

POST /api/checks.json
{}
200
{
  "error": "An error occured"
}
POST /api/checks.json
{
  "check": {
    "user_id": 1875,
    "beer_id": 893
  }
}
200
{
  "users": [
    {
      "created_at": 1364265919,
      "id": 1871,
      "email": "olaf@bode.net",
      "nickname": "Reginald Volkman",
      "avatar_url": {
        "url": "/Users/pierre/prog/beech/beech-server/spec/support/uploads/user/avatar/1871/original.1364265919.png",
        "thumb": {
          "url": "/Users/pierre/prog/beech/beech-server/spec/support/uploads/user/avatar/1871/thumb_original.1364265919.png"
        }
      },
      "already_following": false
    }
  ],
  "beers": [
    {
      "id": 893,
      "name": "Adelia Powlowski",
      "beer_color_id": null
    }
  ],
  "beer_colors": [],
  "check": {
    "created_at": 1364265919,
    "id": 612,
    "user_id": 1871,
    "beer_id": 893
  }
}

Params

  • check : optional [ Must be a Hash ]
    • beer_id : optional [ Must be a number. ]
    • user_id : optional [ Must be a number. ]

Feed

Feed / index

GET /api/my/feed

method description

Examples

GET /api/my/feed.json?users=me
200
{
  "checks": [
    {
      "created_at": 1364265953,
      "id": 695,
      "user_id": 2250,
      "beer_id": 987
    },
    {
      "created_at": 1364265953,
      "id": 696,
      "user_id": 2250,
      "beer_id": 988
    }
  ],
  "users": [
    {
      "created_at": 1364265953,
      "id": 2250,
      "email": "olaf@bode.net",
      "nickname": "Reginald Volkman",
      "avatar_url": {
        "url": "/Users/pierre/prog/beech/beech-server/spec/support/uploads/user/avatar/2250/original.1364265953.png",
        "thumb": {
          "url": "/Users/pierre/prog/beech/beech-server/spec/support/uploads/user/avatar/2250/thumb_original.1364265953.png"
        }
      },
      "already_following": false
    }
  ],
  "beers": [
    {
      "id": 987,
      "name": "Ms. Melisa Mayer",
      "beer_color_id": 85
    },
    {
      "id": 988,
      "name": "Rudolph Koepp V",
      "beer_color_id": 85
    }
  ],
  "beer_colors": [
    {
      "created_at": 1364265953,
      "id": 85,
      "name": null,
      "slug": "blond"
    }
  ],
  "feed": [
    {
      "created_at": 1363920353,
      "id": 1073,
      "eventable": {
        "type": "check",
        "id": 695
      },
      "user_id": 2250
    },
    {
      "created_at": 1363747553,
      "id": 1074,
      "eventable": {
        "type": "check",
        "id": 696
      },
      "user_id": 2250
    }
  ]
}

Followers

Followers / index

GET /api/my/followers
List followers

GET /api/users/:user_id/followers
List followers

Followings

Followings / index

GET /api/my/followings
List followings

GET /api/users/:user_id/followings
List followings

Examples

GET /api/my/followings.json
200
{
  "users": []
}

Followings / create

POST /api/my/followings
Create a following

Examples

POST /api/my/followings.json
{
  "user_id": {
    "avatar": {
      "url": "/Users/pierre/prog/beech/beech-server/spec/support/uploads/user/avatar/2117/original.1364265946.png",
      "thumb": {
        "url": "/Users/pierre/prog/beech/beech-server/spec/support/uploads/user/avatar/2117/thumb_original.1364265946.png"
      }
    },
    "avatar_uploaded_at": null,
    "created_at": "2013-03-26T03:45:46+01:00",
    "email": "jade@mayer.name",
    "id": 2117,
    "nickname": "Cindy Reichert",
    "updated_at": "2013-03-26T03:45:46+01:00"
  }
}
200
{
  "user": {
    "created_at": 1364265946,
    "id": 2117,
    "email": "jade@mayer.name",
    "nickname": "Cindy Reichert",
    "avatar_url": {
      "url": "/Users/pierre/prog/beech/beech-server/spec/support/uploads/user/avatar/2117/original.1364265946.png",
      "thumb": {
        "url": "/Users/pierre/prog/beech/beech-server/spec/support/uploads/user/avatar/2117/thumb_original.1364265946.png"
      }
    },
    "already_following": true
  }
}

Params

  • user_id : optional

Followings / destroy

DELETE /api/my/followings
Destroy a following

Examples

DELETE /api/my/followings.json
200
{
  "error": "An error occured"
}
DELETE /api/my/followings.json?id=2148&user_id=2149
200
{
  "user": {
    "created_at": 1364265948,
    "id": 2149,
    "email": "melisa@ernser.net",
    "nickname": "Jack Cormier",
    "avatar_url": {
      "url": "/Users/pierre/prog/beech/beech-server/spec/support/uploads/user/avatar/2149/original.1364265948.png",
      "thumb": {
        "url": "/Users/pierre/prog/beech/beech-server/spec/support/uploads/user/avatar/2149/thumb_original.1364265948.png"
      }
    },
    "already_following": false
  }
}

Params

  • id : optional
  • user_id : optional [ Must be a number. ]

My badges

My badges / index

GET /api/my/badges
List my badges

GET /api/users/:user_id/badges
List my badges

Examples

GET /api/my/badges.json
200
{
  "badges": [
    {
      "created_at": 1364265942,
      "id": 375,
      "name": "Mrs. Tyra Schultz",
      "description": null,
      "photo_url": {
        "url": "/assets/default-badge.png",
        "thumb": {
          "url": "/assets/thumb_default-badge.png"
        }
      }
    },
    {
      "created_at": 1364265942,
      "id": 374,
      "name": "Ms. Pete Greenfelder",
      "description": null,
      "photo_url": {
        "url": "/assets/default-badge.png",
        "thumb": {
          "url": "/assets/thumb_default-badge.png"
        }
      }
    },
    {
      "created_at": 1364265942,
      "id": 373,
      "name": "5 Stella Artois",
      "description": null,
      "photo_url": {
        "url": "/assets/default-badge.png",
        "thumb": {
          "url": "/assets/thumb_default-badge.png"
        }
      }
    },
    {
      "created_at": 1364265942,
      "id": 372,
      "name": "5 Kronembourg",
      "description": null,
      "photo_url": {
        "url": "/assets/default-badge.png",
        "thumb": {
          "url": "/assets/thumb_default-badge.png"
        }
      }
    }
  ]
}

My beers

My beers / index

GET /api/my/beers
List my beers

GET /api/users/:user_id/beers
List my beers

Examples

GET /api/my/beers
200
{
  "beers": [
    {
      "id": 1038,
      "name": "Kronembourg",
      "checks_count": "1"
    },
    {
      "id": 1039,
      "name": "Stella Artois",
      "checks_count": "1"
    },
    {
      "id": 1040,
      "name": "Guiness",
      "checks_count": "1"
    }
  ]
}

Profiles

Profiles / show

GET /api/my/profile
Show a profile

GET /api/users/:user_id/profile
Show a profile

Examples

GET /api/my/profile.json
200
{
  "feed": [],
  "badges": [],
  "profile": {
    "created_at": 1364265939,
    "id": 2017,
    "email": "ignacio.torp@heller.info",
    "nickname": "Ms. Karlie Renner",
    "avatar_url": {
      "url": "/Users/pierre/prog/beech/beech-server/spec/support/uploads/user/avatar/2017/original.1364265939.png",
      "thumb": {
        "url": "/Users/pierre/prog/beech/beech-server/spec/support/uploads/user/avatar/2017/thumb_original.1364265939.png"
      }
    },
    "check_count": 0,
    "following_count": 0,
    "follower_count": 0,
    "already_following": false,
    "event_ids": [],
    "badge_ids": []
  }
}

Profiles / update

PUT /api/my/profile
Update a profile

Examples

PUT /api/my/profile.json
{
  "id": 1
}
200
{
  "user": {
    "created_at": 1364265939,
    "id": 2017,
    "email": "ignacio.torp@heller.info",
    "nickname": "Ms. Karlie Renner",
    "avatar_url": {
      "url": "/Users/pierre/prog/beech/beech-server/spec/support/uploads/user/avatar/2017/original.1364265939.png",
      "thumb": {
        "url": "/Users/pierre/prog/beech/beech-server/spec/support/uploads/user/avatar/2017/thumb_original.1364265939.png"
      }
    },
    "already_following": false
  }
}

Users

Users / index

GET /api/users
List users

Examples

GET /api/users?s=jean-mich
200
{
  "users": [
    {
      "created_at": 1364265945,
      "id": 2102,
      "email": "monserrat_wolff@sipes.info",
      "nickname": "jean-michel",
      "avatar_url": {
        "url": "/Users/pierre/prog/beech/beech-server/spec/support/uploads/user/avatar/2102/original.1364265945.png",
        "thumb": {
          "url": "/Users/pierre/prog/beech/beech-server/spec/support/uploads/user/avatar/2102/thumb_original.1364265945.png"
        }
      },
      "already_following": false
    }
  ]
}
